channel.title: Gamers Vortex
channel.description:
[center][size=18pt][url=http://rs.gamersvortex.info]Gamers Vortex - Massive private server community[/url][/size][/center]
[center][size=32pt][url=http://rs.gamersvortex.info]JOIN OUR WEBSITE![/size][/center]
[center][b]NOTE: Please do not use your Real Runescape username and password, even though I have an encryptor we don't want the reputation of being 'hackers' or 'phishers', Thank you. [/b][/center]
[center][b]Introduction[/b][/center] Hello, I've recently been thinking and developing a massive private server community. By this I mean we are putting a whole bunch of private servers from runescape to world of warcraft online a VPS and hosting out to everyone! So far I have been developing a Runescape private server and am hoping to make it fairly popular.
[center][b]Runescape private server contents[/b][/center] So far I’ve created the framework using NI/O networking, my main objective in this task is to increase the server performance, therefore I am going to take most of my time developing this part of the server, from there I can add weekly updates intill the server becomes widley used and recognized. [center][img]http://i54.tinypic.com/20gug6.jpg[/img] [img]http://i53.tinypic.com/svqb1l.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][b]Stability[/b][/center] I've been working on how to make the server more stable than ever! Reducing the CPU for both owner and user, although this took me days of work, even in my lunch hours at work I have been trying to solve this.
[center][b]Gallery[/b]
[img]http://gamersvortex.info/gallery/Edit1.JPG[/img]
[img]http://gamersvortex.info/gallery/edit2.JPG[/img]
[img]http://gamersvortex.info/gallery/edit3.JPG[/img]
[img]http://gamersvortex.info/gallery/edit4.JPG[/img]
[img]http://gamersvortex.info/gallery/edit5.JPG[/img]
[img]http://gamersvortex.info/gallery/edit6.JPG[/img]
[img]http://gamersvortex.info/gallery/edit7.JPG[/img]
[img]http://gamersvortex.info/gallery/edit8.JPG[/img]
[img]http://gamersvortex.info/gallery/edit9.JPG[/img]
[img]http://gamersvortex.info/gallery/edit10.JPG[/img]
[b]F2P Server preview[/b][/center]
I have been working on this for the past few weeks, I'm pleased to say that I am ready for the alpha testing on this server. Although needing a VPS is slowing down a few things! So instead I will show you a little about the server and help you understand how to make a few GP when you start!
Obviously this server is going to be unique, running on two different servers (Members and F2P) with the same character files and having the same features as what runescape has to offer (Up to 90% accurate on F2P, P2P still in development) we can give you a nice, smooth and social server where you can meet new people and offer items around!
So far so good eh? Well here's a few pictures you may want to see.
[center][img]http://gamersvortex.info/gallery/rs/pic1.JPG[/img]
[img]http://gamersvortex.info/gallery/rs/pic2.JPG[/img]
[img]http://gamersvortex.info/gallery/rs/pic3.JPG[/img]
[img]http://gamersvortex.info/gallery/rs/pic4.JPG[/img]
[img]http://gamersvortex.info/gallery/rs/pic5.JPG[/img] [/center]
[center][b]Quests[/b][/center]
I have currently added 11 quests, although not all of them are accessible by F2P players, membership will be required in order to move around the map more freely and explore new items ect. Although the F2P players will be able to see the P2P items they will not be able to trade, sell (on F2P server) or drop. This is to keep members from giving items to F2P players!

item.title: Gamers Vortex
item.dc:creator: @Kono-chan Kono-chan
item.description:
@Kono-chan wrote:

[quote=“Kaex, post:22, topic:383610”]Obvious project insanity man I’m pretty sure you didn’t make the framework and why is this still it, its complete shite…

You also shown a picture of event manager classes and posted this:

I’ve been working on how to make the server more stable than ever! Reducing the CPU for both owner and user,

One, event manager isn’t going to make it more stable it justs creates a ‘time’ class for events?
Two, ‘Owner’ and ‘User’? Are you that much of a retard or something. An owner logging on and a user logging on are both connections connecting to the server source (Could be a DEDI for e.g?) Explain the difference now, they’re the same…

@Kono

You say only people who will see PHP code is you and some other dude? Or I might have misread it but I’d see it also as I greatly adore PHP.[/quote]

The only people who I will let see it are myself and X-Logic. I’m not givin’ it out to anyone lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Gamers Vortex
item.dc:creator: @Kaex Kaex
item.description:
@Kaex wrote:

Obvious project insanity man I’m pretty sure you didn’t make the framework and why is this still it, its complete shite…

You also shown a picture of event manager classes and posted this:

I've been working on how to make the server more stable than ever! Reducing the CPU for both owner and user,

One, event manager isn’t going to make it more stable it justs creates a ‘time’ class for events?
Two, ‘Owner’ and ‘User’? Are you that much of a retard or something. An owner logging on and a user logging on are both connections connecting to the server source (Could be a DEDI for e.g?) Explain the difference now, they’re the same…

@Kono

You say only people who will see PHP code is you and some other dude? Or I might have misread it but I’d see it also as I greatly adore PHP.

Read full topic

item.title: Gamers Vortex
item.dc:creator: @Kono-chan Kono-chan
item.description:
@Kono-chan wrote:

[quote=“m1lkman, post:20, topic:383610”][quote author=Kono-chan link=topic=479381.msg3522741#msg3522741 date=1299534023]

I don’t think the p2p 508+ will help out…
RS-2007 has a better looking site. You might wanna look at theirs and take a look at their source code so you can better yours.

I hope you didn’t just tell someone to steal the source-code I made.

And honestly, I’m probably going to make an HD website source and release it for anyone to use sometime in the future.
[/quote]
\No I meant read and look at it. Compare it to your script and go from there, I didn’t say to copy it.

Cool cant wait for it to come out.[/quote]

If you mean HTML and CSS, then there’s not really anything I can do about that. But if you meant the PHP and SQL, then… Yeah… The only people who will ever see that is myself and x-logic.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Kono-chan Kono-chan
item.description:
@Kono-chan wrote:

[quote=“Saphire`, post:13, topic:383610”]They can’t touch the content, F2P is 317 and P2P will be 508+ with mega updates.

I’m only trying this, may not work out to full expectations but it’s worth a go.[/quote]

Not saying they could. Saying they could easily find a different server that’s completely free.

Though most servers out there suck anyways, so meh… Sad how people tend to actually like those servers, though. What with corrupt owners and staff members.

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote=“Saphire`, post:11, topic:383610”]I may be doing that, but for now I’ll be using a forum base until I get enough donations to buy a VPS.That will give me more incentive to do the site.

Free to play preview is up, pay to play still in development.[/quote]

P2P? Epic lawsuit there. Plus I don’t see very many people paying for more content when they could just move to a different server that’s completely free.

Read full topic

item.title: Gamers Vortex
item.dc:creator: @Kono-chan Kono-chan
item.description:
@Kono-chan wrote:

[quote=“Saphire`, post:9, topic:383610”][quote author=Kono-chan link=topic=479381.msg3510951#msg3510951 date=1298562903]
So I see you used mike rs web.

Yeah… mike rs web is excessively shitty and not very safe. Wouldn’t suggest using it unless you plan to fix it up really well.

EDIT:

Also funny how you deleted my post on your forums about how shitty mike rs web is. Learn some PHP and MySQL so you can make your own website instead of leeching his and taking out the credits to him.

Anyone with a copy of mike rs web can easily hack your site.
[/quote] i totally changed it, I know a lot more PHP than you think, I put credits for mike because I didn’t have images and some code I did rip.

It isnt a stable site no, this is why I will be changing the site around completely tonight.

Also, the reason I deleted your post and the other one is because I don’t want any posts on that topic, and yeah I could lock but there’s a glitch so I cant and i haven’t really got time with work and everything. I will be changing the site soon. Final.[/quote]

Why not just make a new site from scratch? Seems like it would be a lot easier than going through and fixing the hundreds of problems and things he did badly… Not to mention all of the graphical problems, ie: missing bottom scrolls, brown boxes, etc. Those arn’t exactly relevant to performance, but they make the site look overall a lot better.

Read full topic

item.title: Gamers Vortex
item.dc:creator: @Saphire1 Saphire`
item.description:
@Saphire1 wrote:

[center][size=18pt]Gamers Vortex - Massive private server community[/size][/center]

[center][size=32pt][url=http://rs.gamersvortex.info]JOIN OUR WEBSITE![/size][/center]

[center]NOTE: Please do not use your Real Runescape username and password, even though I have an encryptor we don’t want the reputation of being ‘hackers’ or ‘phishers’, Thank you. [/center]

[center]Introduction[/center]
Hello, I’ve recently been thinking and developing a massive private server community. By this I mean we are putting a whole bunch of private servers from runescape to world of warcraft online a VPS and hosting out to everyone! So far I have been developing a Runescape private server and am hoping to make it fairly popular.

[center]Runescape private server contents[/center]
So far I’ve created the framework using NI/O networking, my main objective in this task is to increase the server performance, therefore I am going to take most of my time developing this part of the server, from there I can add weekly updates intill the server becomes widley used and recognized.
[center]

svqb1l.jpg800×600
[/center]

[center]Stability[/center]
I’ve been working on how to make the server more stable than ever! Reducing the CPU for both owner and user, although this took me days of work, even in my lunch hours at work I have been trying to solve this.

[center]Gallery

F2P Server preview[/center]

I have been working on this for the past few weeks, I’m pleased to say that I am ready for the alpha testing on this server. Although needing a VPS is slowing down a few things! So instead I will show you a little about the server and help you understand how to make a few GP when you start!

Obviously this server is going to be unique, running on two different servers (Members and F2P) with the same character files and having the same features as what runescape has to offer (Up to 90% accurate on F2P, P2P still in development) we can give you a nice, smooth and social server where you can meet new people and offer items around!

So far so good eh? Well here’s a few pictures you may want to see.

[center]


[/center]

[center]Quests[/center]

I have currently added 11 quests, although not all of them are accessible by F2P players, membership will be required in order to move around the map more freely and explore new items ect. Although the F2P players will be able to see the P2P items they will not be able to trade, sell (on F2P server) or drop. This is to keep members from giving items to F2P players!
